content:
KeyTipService Class

In this Article

Represents a service that provides properties, methods, and events to enable and manage KeyTips in WPF Ribbon controls.

Syntax

Declaration

public class KeyTipService

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • System.Object
  • KeyTipService
